explore.about: Scuba diving is a very fun and freeing sport but like every other sport, there are risks
explore.next: This is why all scuba divers must be scuba certified before setting foot in ocean waters.

explore.about: With that out of the way, here is a run down on Scuba Diving.
explore.next: Scuba diving is a type of underwater diving whereby divers use breathing equipment that is completely independent of a surface air supply.

explore.about: All this means is that scuba divers breathe using an air tank. Heck, the word 'scuba' stands for: Self-Contained Underwater Breathing Apparatus
explore.next: The attraction behind Scuba Diving is that it allows us divers to experience the undersea world.

explore.about: There is a beauty in seeing a whole new world that has yet to be truly affected by human intervention that makes it almost pure.
explore.next: It can be a calming experience as well as an adventurous one. You only need to experience it once to understand why there is such an appeal behind it.
